sentences.en: Acceptability for storage in the overhead compartment is dependent on the weight of the baggage.
sentences.cn: 行李是否可放在头顶的行李架上取决于行李的重量.

sentences.en: Acceptability, however, can be highly subjective.
sentences.cn: 然而, 可接受性通常带有极其明显的主观色彩.

sentences.en: Critical limitA value which separates acceptability from unacceptability.
sentences.cn: 管制界限:将次品和成品分开所设的标准值.

sentences.en: Failure to abort completely, side-effects and acceptability were the main outcomes of interest.
sentences.cn: 不完全流产、副作用和可接受性是我们关心的主要结果。

sentences.en: I don't think acceptability should be a problem as the audience also grown up with us.
sentences.cn: 我不觉得观众接受起来会有什么问题,因为观众也跟我们一起长大了.

sentences.en: In either case, the customer ultimately determines the acceptability of the product.
sentences.cn: 在任一情况下, 产品是否可接受最终由顾客确定.

sentences.en: Ink receptivity: Uniform acceptability of ink on paper surface.
sentences.cn: 受墨度: 纸面受墨的平均程度.

sentences.en: It will please Thai consumers, he believes, and might also help broaden the acceptability of the durian, unlocking the door to American and European customers.
sentences.cn: 他相信无臭榴莲将会取悦泰国消费者，同时有助于扩大榴莲的可接受性，打开面向美国和欧美消费者的大门。

sentences.en: Methods: To test the coefficient of in taking baits with selective acceptability test.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用有选择接受性试验测定各基饵的摄食系数.

sentences.en: Mr Short's behaviour is only on the cusp of acceptability.
sentences.cn: 肖特先生的行为勉强能接受。

sentences.en: Practice proved that this architecture has good suitability, scalability, and acceptability.
sentences.cn: 实践表明,该分类体系具有良好的普适性和可扩展性, 能够适应于多种应用的需要.

sentences.en: The acceptability of real number system depends on practice.
sentences.cn: 实数系统的可接受性依赖于实践.

sentences.en: The acceptability of the test moisture cream was also enquired at the end of the study.
sentences.cn: 研究结束时,查询了患者对测试的保湿乳霜之接受程度.

sentences.en: The engineer's decisions as to the acceptability of any such alternative shall be final.
sentences.cn: 至于任一选择的可接受性,工程师的决定将是最终结果.

sentences.en: The formal demonstration of system acceptability to obtain authorization for its operational use.
sentences.cn: 为使系统获准投入运行性使用,对系统的可接受性所做的正式演示.

sentences.en: The general principle of law should be involved in purposiveness , relevance and acceptability.
sentences.cn: 该原则为行政法上一般法律原则,必须具备合目的性、关联性、可接受性三大要素.

sentences.en: The preliminary conclusion of this thesis is that Ding Di employed a large quantity of Chinese four-character phrases in his translation, which added to its "acceptability".
sentences.cn: 本文得出的初步结论是：大陆译者丁棣在译本中采用了大量的汉语四字成语，增强了译文的“可接受性”。

sentences.en: To compare medical abortion practised at home and in clinics in terms of effectiveness, safety and acceptability.
sentences.cn: 旨在比较在家或在诊所进行药物流产的有效性、安全性和可接受性。

phrases.tran_cn: 社交能力；社会可接受性；社会接受度
